page.title: 09FARMING continued 2
page.content: His machinery consists of 4 tractors, cultivators, one bailer, one plough, one combine-harvester, one forage harvester and 4/5 trailers. Mr Houghton does not have a summer holiday though he may have a short one in February.He is not self-sufficient. Cold Harbour Farm is very old. There used to be a Roman Road and a Roman Villa there. {POLITICS} The majority of people in our D block are satisfied with Mr Pearce, of the Conservative Party who represents this area. {POPULATION l8000 to 20000. The average number of children is two to three. {SUPERNATURAL Fairthorne Manor has a ghost which drifts across the Lake on misty nights and sobs.
